# Registration

```{r, echo=F, results=F, message=F, warning=F}
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(readxl)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(stringr)

registration_dates <- 
  read_excel("data/key_dates.xlsx",
             sheet = "Registration") |> 
  separate(col = "Item", sep = "\\s+(?=\\S*$)", into = c("Item1", "Item2")) |> 
  mutate(across(.cols = c(Item1, Item2),
                .fns = str_to_title))

```

```{r echo=F, message=F, warning=F}
registration_dates |> 
  select(Item2, Date) |> 
  kable(col.names = c("", "Date")) |>
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed")) |> 
  pack_rows(index = table(registration_dates$Item1))
  
```
